content.title: Error: File already exists
content.body:
View details in Rollbar: [https://app.rollbar.com/a/thomas.iniguez/fix/item/FirstProject/9](https://app.rollbar.com/a/thomas.iniguez/fix/item/FirstProject/9)

```

Error: C:\Users\alpha\AppData\Roaming\youtube\src\client-dist\socket.io.js.map:File already exists
  File "C:\Users\alpha\AppData\Local\Programs\youtube\resources\app.asar\src\index.js", line 38, in <unknown>
  File "C:\Users\alpha\AppData\Local\Programs\youtube\resources\app.asar\node_modules\electron-log\src\core\Logger.js", line 178, in <unknown>
  File "<anonymous>", line unknown, in Array.reduce
  File "C:\Users\alpha\AppData\Local\Programs\youtube\resources\app.asar\node_modules\electron-log\src\core\Logger.js", line 177, in Logger.processMessage
  File "C:\Users\alpha\AppData\Local\Programs\youtube\resources\app.asar\node_modules\electron-log\src\core\Logger.js", line 136, in Logger.logData
  File "C:\Users\alpha\AppData\Local\Programs\youtube\resources\app.asar\node_modules\electron-log\src\core\Logger.js", line 86, in <computed> [as error]
  File "C:\Users\alpha\AppData\Local\Programs\youtube\resources\app.asar\src\index.js", line 344, in <unknown>
  File "node:internal/process/task_queues", line 95, in process.processTicksAndRejections
```
content.author: alphaleadership

acceptanceCriteria: The 'youtube' application must start successfully without displaying the 'Error: C:\Users\alpha\AppData\Roaming\youtube\src\client-dist\socket.io.js.map:File already exists' message.
The `socket.io.js.map` file should be correctly managed by the application during installation, updates, and runtime, avoiding 'File already exists' conflicts.
Users should be able to launch and operate the 'youtube' application without encountering file system related errors on Windows operating systems.

details: The specific actions or scenario that consistently triggers this 'File already exists' error (e.g., first launch, update, specific feature use).
The exact version of the 'youtube' application being used.
Details about the operating system (e.g., Windows 10, Windows 11) and any relevant user permissions.
The content of `C:\Users\alpha\AppData\Local\Programs\youtube\resources\app.asar\src\index.js` around lines 38 and 344 to understand the file operations being performed.
Whether the issue is reproducible across different environments or specific to the reporter's machine.
